name: ebt-agent-skills
description: Custom agent skills for code review, cleanup, and collaboration workflows.

plugins.name: cleanup-review
plugins.description: Review changed or staged code for structural cleanup: redundancy, dead code, rule violations, and low-value noise. Use when reviewing diffs, PRs, or modified files before commit. Reports findings only â€” does not apply changes unless explicitly instructed.

plugins.name: subagent-collab
plugins.description: Delegate subtasks to other coding agents via CLI. Use when a task benefits from isolated execution, parallel work, a second opinion, or specialized analysis. Do NOT use for trivial tasks you can complete faster yourself.

plugins.name: release-notes
plugins.description: Generate release notes for a given release.
